mapper.insert: insert into combinatorial_discount (product_one_id, product_two_id, discount_amount, begin, end) values (#{productOneId}, #{productTwoId}, #{discountAmount}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.select: select * from combinatorial_discount where (product_one_id = #{productOne} and product_two_id = #{productTwo}) or (product_one_id = #{productTwo} and product_two_id = #{productOne}) order by discount_amount desc limit 1
